title: skin idea-Zac
body: i think there should be another zac skin because he only has one. so i was thinking that he should be an ocean, he should have fish swimming through him and his color can be a deep blue or light

replies.body:
Why not:
True Ice Zac
Since Riot already knows how to make shifting ice and shifting blades, Zac could get the same visual treatment. He would also gain some vocal effects. His whole body would be a living sentient and embodiment of True Ice. 
His Passive becomes pieces of shards of True Ice.
Q becomes a sharp stab.
W Ice shards explode and pierce everyone around him.
E His whole lower body becomes a shard of ice
His Ult is a huge bouncing Spiky but rigid organic matter.

How's that for a not-recolor of Zac?
well yeah that would work as well

I was thinking Project Zac. His body could be black with glowing line marks throughout his body (tron legacy like) that has interchangable colour preferences such as orange or blue. 

Passive: Instead of just his blobs it would be his body parts reattaching themselves. You would have the torso and head as the centre part that isn't targetable and is simply there for aesthetics. His arms and legs would make up the four blobs. 

Q. Instead of just a punch Zac would turn his arms into piercing spikes that would pierce the enemy. 
W. Would be a shockwave of electricity that would have the same colour as the glowing line markings. 
E. Zac would turn his body into a missile and it would explode in a ball of light in the landing area.
R. Zac's form would change shapes with each bounce.
